XPixelGroup/DiffBIR

Restores blurry or damaged images by removing noise and regenerating details using generative diffusion models

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Image restoration using diffusion-yielded score priors
  • diffusion transformer models for video restoration
  • One-step video restoration with a diffusion transformer
  • open-source diffusion engine for AI image and video generation
  • inpainting and outpainting for images and video using any diffusion model
  • Diffusion transformer for image generation with sub-second latency
  • Recovers text from pixelized screenshots
  • open-source AI upscaler and enhancer for images
  • Upscales images with AI algorithms
